page.title: 16ENJOYMENT IN GARTMORE
page.content: Mrs Jean Woodburn, who works at the Ward-Toll Nursery, has written 4 {pantomime scripts.}"Aladdin II", "Fairy Steps", "Beauty and the Beanstalk" and "Cinderella". She got the idea of doing a pantomime after seeing a school concert. The 1986 pantomime is to be "Off-White & the Seven Dwarfs". There will be 3 nightly performances with donations going to charity. Last year's Pantomime was about Aladdin when his daughters had grown up. One married the Geni. Some village children were in the cast, as well as one of the teachers. In the{swing park}we have a seesaw, slide, roundabout, climbing frame, rocket, 2 baby swings, 4 big swings, 3 tunnels and a "Monkey Puzzle" frame. We play{"Monkey Puzzle Tig".}1 person goes "het". You have to go all over the frame so that you are not caught.
